metadata.title: CVE-2022-48774 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:dmaengine: ptdma: Fix the error handling path in pt_core_init()In order to free resources correctly in the error handling path ofpt_core_init(), 2 goto's have to be switched. Otherwise, some resourceswill leak and we will try to release things that have not been allocatedyet.Also move a dev_err() to a place where it is more meaningful.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
